column1: How many servings this recipe makes
Directions: you can put instructions for each step and the time for each step
API for extracting recipe details from websites
Clone existing recipe and modify fields to create a new recipe
Can suggest any random recipe to make
Share recipes (just send file or link to app)
Populate shopping items based on recipe ingredients
Can narrow down suggestion by tags
Upload pictures and comment after you try a recipe
Ingredients are categorized into aisles (dairy, produce, etc)
Filter by occasion (birthday, party, Thanksgiving, etc.)
Link other recipes that go well with this one
Cross off ingredients that you already have
Remove selected items or clear entire shopping list
Track the current step of the recipe
Can mark recipes as "Favorite" or "Make later"
Can edit or delete saved recipes
